friday.title: O le a se mea e mafai ona ou fesoasoani ia te oe?
friday.welcome: Susu mai i le Aso Faraile, lau fesoasoani a le Aai-sasaina!
friday.prompt: Fesili mai ia te aʻu soʻo se mea pe amata se galuega fou.
friday.help: Manaomia le fesoasoani? Ua ou sau e taʻitaʻi oe.

authentication.password-label: Numera e le iloa e sesi

projects.title-placeholder: Ulu atu i le poloketi ulutala
projects.description-placeholder: Ulu atu i le poloketi faamatalaga

errors.generic: Se mea na sese. Faamolemole toe taumafai.
errors.unauthorized: E te le o faatagaina e faia lenei gaioiga.
errors.invalid-input: Faʻamolemole siaki lau sao ma toe taumafai.
errors.network: Network sese. Faʻamolemole siaki lau fesoʻotaʻiga.

tooltips.new-project: Amata se poloketi fou e faatulaga ai au galuega.
tooltips.automation-run: Tamoe lenei otometi e faatino galuega muamua.
tooltips.library-search: Saili mo Sososlates, tusitusiga, po o ata tifaga.
tooltips.space-invite: Valaaulia au tofi e galulue faatasi i lenei avanoa.
